hotelsystem.controller

Class DatabaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelsystem.controller.DatabaseController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FoodController, PromoController, RoomController, RoomStatusController, RoomTypeController

    public abstract class DatabaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Description of DatabaseManager A manager to manage database for writing and reading the database. DatabaseManager is an abstract class that can be overwritten by other manager.
    Since:
    17/4/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kan Kah Seng, Kenneth Yak Yong Seng, Koh Wei Hao, Solberg Anna

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseController()
      Check and creates the database linkage

      Prints error message if access to database is denied.

      • write

        public void write(java.lang.String fileName,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> data)
        Creates a write to database(Saving info to database)
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file path to write to
        data - data contains information to be saved. Throws exception if fail to save to database.
